name: oggy
description: AI-powered CLI agent for comprehensive code analysis, commit review, and production readiness assessment

scripts.build:all: bun build src/cli.ts --compile --target bun-windows-x64 --outfile oggy.exe && bun build src/cli.ts --compile --target bun-linux-x64 --outfile oggy-linux && bun build src/cli.ts --compile --target bun-linux-arm64 --outfile oggy-linux-arm64 && bun build src/cli.ts --compile --target bun-darwin-x64 --outfile oggy-macos && bun build src/cli.ts --compile --target bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile oggy-macos-arm64
scripts.build:linux: bun build src/cli.ts --compile --target bun-linux-x64 --outfile oggy-linux && bun build src/cli.ts --compile --target bun-linux-arm64 --outfile oggy-linux-arm64
scripts.build:macos: bun build src/cli.ts --compile --target bun-darwin-x64 --outfile oggy-macos && bun build src/cli.ts --compile --target bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile oggy-macos-arm64
